item.title: Enjoy type hinting and its benefits
item.description:
Description

From Python 3, type hinting was prompted. Thanks to this, static type analysis is now available in Pythonâ€™s world. It is possible to use this mechanism with mypy, intellij etc. In this session we will learn about type hinting in Python 3.5 / 3.6/ 3.7. Next, learn how to use static type analysis using mypy. It is also possible to use mypy not only in Python 3 but also in Python 2. In other words, it is said to demonstrate great power to port Python 2 code to Python 3.
